56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Zaid bin Khalid:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, " He who pre pares a Ghazi going in Allah's Cause is given a reward equal to that of) a Ghazi; and he who looks after properly the dependents of a Ghazi going in Allah's Cause is (given a reward equal to that of) Ghazi

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ مَنْ جَهَّزَ غَازِيًا أَوْ خَلَفَهُ بِخَيْرٍ
chapter.eng-name: The superiority of the one who prepares a Ghazi or looks after his dependents
